author: GothamResearch
content: AAC Technologies (Ticker = 2018): Why are AAC’s reported margins higher AND smoother than Apple’s? Part I (Preview) https://t.co/ChTBiwlSFL

author: GothamResearch
content:
OUR OPINIONS
(1) AAC has used 20+ undisclosed related parties & dubious accounting to overstate & smoothen profits since 2014.

author: GothamResearch
content:
In this regard, AAC reminds us of Longtop Financial Technologies.
(2) AAC has used these hidden entities to evade Apple’s labor standards,

author: GothamResearch
content:
specified in the Apple Supplier Code of Conduct. 

(3) Apple $AAPL & others will conduct investigations into AAC, & validate our findings.

author: GothamResearch
content: As a result, AAC’s profit margins will decline, converging to its peers’ levels. Consequently, shares will decline to the 40-50 HKD levels

author: GothamResearch
content: (4) Unlike certain schemes that can last indefinitely, Gotham City Research believes AAC’s apparent schemes will come to an end shortly.
